content: हाल(ला)हलं {@--1@} A sort of deadly poison produced at the churning of the ocean; (being of a very virulent character it began to burn up everything when it was swallowed by the god Śiva); अहमेव गुरुः सुदारुणानामिति हालाहल मास्म तात दृष्यः . ननु संति भवादृशानि भूयो भुवनेऽस्मिन् वचनानि दुर्जनानां <ls>Subhāṣ.</ls> {@--2@} (Hence) A deadly poison or poison in general; see <ls>Bv. 1. 95</ls>, <ls n="Bv.">2. 73</ls>; <ls>Pt. 1. 188.</ls> (Also written हलाहल or हालहाल).
हालाहलः {@--1@} A kind of insect. {@--2@} A kind of lizard. --ला A small mouse. --ली Spirituous liquor. --लं {@--1@} = हालहल (1). {@--2@} Spirituous liquor.
